short_summary: Electrical Work for an Automated Radiosonde Launching System at the Inukjuak Upper Air Station. Period of the contract: from award to October 31, 2022.
description: Main objective is to identify the • unambiguously and clearly determined, • to the extent known, up-to-date, and complete, requirements •  for the development, construction, implementation, testing, deployment (if möglich), provision of training services (if applicable), maintenance, warranty, and disposal of the automated launching system as well as of the automated weather system.” contract pub_start_date:
